caption.p: OS (A), PFS (B), LRC (C), and DM (D) in the ICT/CCRT and CCRT Arms in the Intention-to-Treat Analysis. Abbreviations used: CCRT: concurrent chemoradiotherapy; ICT/CCRT: induction chemotherapy followed by concurrent chemoradiotherapy; DM: distant metastasis; LRC: locoregional control; OS: overall survival; PFS: progression-free survival.
